title: Vedalam Teaser Creates A New World Record By Smashing The One Set By Taylor Swift's 'Bad Blood'
text:

The official teaser of Thala Ajith 's Vedalam was released at the stroke of midnight (October 8th) and the 45 seconds video has already smashed a certain record, earlier set by American singer Taylor Swift in the video sharing website YouTube. 
By amassing a whopping 50,000 likes in just one hour from the time the video was made public, Vedalam teaser has now officially created a new record in the history of YouTube. 
Vedalam crossed 50K likes without even breaking a sweat and in the process overtook the record set by Taylor Swift's musical video 'Bad Blood' which had gathered 34K likes in one hour, according to a report that's doing the rounds in many social media platforms. 
After 12 hours, the teaser has so far managed to gather an impressive 84,158 likes and close to 7 Lakh views. At this rate, this particular teaser might go on to set several other records in the cyber world. 
The movie is all set to be released this Diwali and for all Ajith fans, Vedalam might brighten up the already dazzling festival of lights to unbelievable heights. 
Check out the slides below for some interesting facts about Vedalam: Ajith's Vedalam Teaser Creates A New Record By Smashing The One Set By Taylor Swift's 'Bad Blood' 1/7 GV Prakash's Loss Is Anirudh's Gain 
Initially, the team of Vedalam had planned to rope in GV Prakash to take care of the musical bit of the film. Anirudh was subsequently signed in as Prakash had allotted his dates for Vijay's 59th film. Vidyullekha Raman will be seen in a Ajith film for the second time after Veeram . Reportedly, the actress will be seen in the flash back sequences of Vedalam . Ajith's Vedalam Teaser Creates A New Record By Smashing The One Set By Taylor Swift's 'Bad Blood' 4/7 Song Lyrics 
The film will feature 5 songs including the theme music, according to a report. All songs have been penned by Madhan Karky and Viveka. Ajith's Vedalam Teaser Creates A New Record By Smashing The One Set By Taylor Swift's 'Bad Blood' 5/7 Raghava Lawrence Does It For Ajith
